<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"allOf inherits parent required"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/allof-parent-required"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Parent object marks the "pet" property as required while its schema is composed via allOf.

Schema:
```yaml
type: object
properties:
  pet:
    allOf:
      - type: object
        properties:
          name:
            type: string
      - type: object
        properties:
          age:
            type: integer
required: [pet]
```


<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Successful response","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"pet":{"allOf":[{"type":"object","properties":{"name":{"type":"string"}}},{"type":"object","properties":{"age":{"type":"integer"}}}]}},"required":["pet"]}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
